LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.label: triple rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a cluster of three large-bore explosive rockets. Because of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Rocket.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.label: doomsday rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a massive explosive projectile. Because of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_DoomsdayRocket.label: doomsday rocket
